List.String: Why do we all have to wear these "RIDICULOUS" ties?
Oh? You seem to have woken up, finally.
Just head on through that big door, the one with the triangle.
...Any day now.
Welcome to our training ground, of sorts. Here we test to see if you're equipped to handle the actual "fun" stuff.
First, we'll test to see if you have mastered the functional use of your limbs. First door on your left.
We're not expecting much.
No, not that one. The first door on the left - right next to the door you came in from.
No, not that one "either". First door on the left.
They won't open, alright? First we need to make sure you're able to do the "BASICS".
Which, fortunately for you, don't include understanding "basic" instructions.
Good, this first part is all pretty simple stuff.
Just head on through the open door.
We'll start off with something easy. See that door? Just jump your way over there.
D-did you fall? That's... almost impressive, really.
Well done. You can jump. Let's continue.
Don't fall this time.
See that hole? Crawl through it.
Aw, you didn't make it. If only there was "some" way to hold it open.
Wow. You can use your arms AND your head? Truly impressive.
Now THIS is easy. See the door? Just walk over there.
Ouch. I probably should've mentioned you do need to hurry.
Now this one? I won't lie. It's still rather easy.
And since I forgot it last time, you really do need to hurry with this one.
Well at least this time you won't be crushed to death. Maybe.
Oof. It happens. Head back and just start again, right?
Just... keep trying.
Not... great, I have to admit.
Just... Keep. Trying.
Very impressive. You've show a "remarkable" ability to do basic functions with your arms and legs. Fantastic.
Head on over back to the elevator, and we can continue.
...Finally. So far you've shown...
Very little.
Go back to the elevator. Hopefully you're not as terrible with the next one.
